ygData.subject: Re: One word (well, two) Yiz Pon
ygData.msgSnippet: Like i said spelling is not an issue,right? I mean this is a forum for information not for us to be spelling teachers. This place has been killer for me, I
ygData.messageBody:
Like i said spelling is not an issue,right?
I mean this is a forum for information not for us to be spelling
teachers.
This place has been killer for me, I have gotten tons of info of this
forum and man you are doing a great job keep up the good work

now if anyone could please tell me who is skilled at baking smithing and
pottery

i need some help in these skills, i have 82 in baking i have 34 in pottery
and i am thinking about smithing,
now the question i have for smithing is how much do i need to get started?
and as far as baking i have been making fish fillets all the way up to 82
skill points and what is the next thing i should be making to get my skill
up to about 120, I want to thank all of you for whoever has been responding
to my questions,so you guys know who you are.

----- Original Message -----
From: Drew Simonis - US Internet Support <Care227@...>
To: <EQCheats@onelist.com>
Sent: Sunday, July 25, 1999 9:13 AM
Subject: Re: [EQCheats] One word (well, two) Yiz Pon


> From: Drew Simonis - US Internet Support <Care227@...>
>
> I have to type fast to get messages in before my boss peeks around into
> my office, so I don't spell check, I don't even proofread. I just type
> and send. So sue me!
>
>
>

and

info on
